messages.event.sign_gate: Gate District: speak to neighbors, gather clues, and follow the roads.
messages.event.sign_plaza: Grand Plaza: east to the guild, west to the old hall, north to the market.
messages.event.enter_hall: The old hall is mostly empty now, but the air still smells like parchment.
messages.event.enter_guild: The guild lobby hums with scribes cataloging stories and trade records.
messages.event.chest_herb_opened: Inside the chest: a wrapped herb bundle sealed in wax cloth.
messages.event.archive_locked: The archive chest is locked by guild protocol. Quill must authorize it.
messages.event.archive_found: You found a sun ribbon, stamped with the guild crest.
messages.event.chest_empty: Only dust and splinters remain in this chest.
messages.event.lyra.quest_start: Lyra: Bring me the herb bundle from the east quarter and I will trade a moon badge.
messages.event.lyra.quest_wait: Lyra: The herb bundle should be in a tucked-away chest near the eastern lanes.
messages.event.lyra.quest_complete: Lyra: Perfect. Here, take this moon badge and ask Captain Sable for market access.
messages.event.lyra.after_quest: Lyra: Keep the roads in your head. This town rewards people who remember paths.
messages.event.borin.key_given: Borin: Take this iron key. Sable only trusts travelers who carry forged steel.
messages.event.borin.after: Borin: If Quill sends you to the archives, check the ribbon stamps for date marks.
messages.event.sable.needs_key: Sable: No pass without proof from Borin.
messages.event.sable.pass_given: Sable: You are cleared. Here is a market pass. Show it in the eastern district.
messages.event.sable.after: Sable: Keep moving. The plaza gets dangerous when people stand still.
messages.event.quill.task_start: Quill: Fetch the sun ribbon from the archive chest and return at once.
messages.event.quill.task_wait: Quill: The archive chest sits in the southeast stacks. Bring me the ribbon.
messages.event.quill.task_complete: Quill: Excellent record work. Accept this guild seal.
messages.event.elowen.cross_town: Elowen: Ask people in the south ring about the old guild feud; their answers connect.
messages.event.elowen.after: Elowen: You are weaving threads between districts. Keep following the names.
messages.dialog.npc_tarin.hello: Tarin: I keep seeing Borin and Quill arguing about archive dates.
messages.dialog.npc_tarin.rumor: Tarin: Lyra trades moon badges for practical errands, not heroics.
messages.dialog.npc_tarin.direction: Tarin: Follow the road east, then south; that is where cross-town errands begin.
messages.dialog.npc_mara.hello: Mara: I map shortcuts by counting lamp posts.
messages.dialog.npc_mara.rumor: Mara: Captain Sable checks for an iron key before issuing passes.
messages.dialog.npc_mara.direction: Mara: The guild doors are on the far east side.
messages.dialog.npc_nessa.hello: Nessa: In this town, every task points to another person.
messages.dialog.npc_nessa.rumor: Nessa: Quill does not trust verbal reports, only stamped objects.
messages.dialog.npc_nessa.direction: Nessa: The southeast shelves hide older records.
messages.dialog.npc_oswin.hello: Oswin: Markets open wider once Sable knows your name.
messages.dialog.npc_oswin.rumor: Oswin: Lyra's moon badge can calm most gate checks.
messages.dialog.npc_oswin.direction: Oswin: Try the central signpost when you get lost.
messages.dialog.npc_pru.hello: Pru: I trade gossip for directions.
messages.dialog.npc_pru.rumor: Pru: The old hall is quiet, but clues still collect there.
messages.dialog.npc_pru.direction: Pru: Roads at y=10 and y=14 are your fastest loops.
messages.dialog.npc_ren.hello: Ren: Travelers who ask better questions finish quests faster.
messages.dialog.npc_ren.rumor: Ren: South ring folks mention Elowen when asked about guild history.
messages.dialog.npc_ren.direction: Ren: You can cross town quickly by staying on the major roads.
messages.dialog.npc_selin.hello: Selin: I listen for keyword repeats in conversations.
messages.dialog.npc_selin.rumor: Selin: The words key, pass, ribbon, and seal form a reliable chain.
messages.dialog.npc_tovan.hello: Tovan: I mark people by the tools they carry.
messages.dialog.npc_tovan.rumor: Tovan: Borin's iron key opens doors in social terms, not literal locks.
messages.dialog.npc_tovan.direction: Tovan: If stuck, revisit Lyra and Quill.
messages.dialog.npc_ursa.hello: Ursa: I patrol in loops, same as you probably should.
messages.dialog.npc_ursa.rumor: Ursa: Sable softens once guild tasks are underway.
messages.dialog.npc_ursa.direction: Ursa: Southeast shelves, then east hall.
messages.dialog.npc_vann.hello: Vann: I keep a ledger of small favors.
messages.dialog.npc_vann.rumor: Vann: Elowen knows who spoke to whom.
messages.dialog.npc_vann.direction: Vann: Southern ring conversations complete the map.
messages.dialog.npc_wren.hello: Wren: Everything here is a chain of references.
messages.dialog.npc_wren.rumor: Wren: Ask one name, get two more.
messages.dialog.npc_wren.direction: Wren: Walk the east-west road and stop at each district column.
messages.dialog.npc_xara.hello: Xara: I archive stories by district.
messages.dialog.npc_xara.rumor: Xara: Quill was mentored by Elowen.
messages.dialog.npc_yorik.hello: Yorik: The guild feud ended, but people still speak in fragments.
messages.dialog.npc_yorik.rumor: Yorik: Sun ribbons used to mark reconciliations.
messages.dialog.npc_yorik.direction: Yorik: Return to Quill when you find one.
messages.dialog.npc_zev.hello: Zev: I came for trade and stayed for the stories.
messages.dialog.npc_zev.rumor: Zev: Ask Galen and Iora about the southern families.
messages.dialog.npc_zev.direction: Zev: South ring loops are short and useful.
messages.dialog.npc_aela.hello: Aela: Every district has one person who tracks everyone else.
messages.dialog.npc_aela.rumor: Aela: In the north, that person is Elowen.
messages.dialog.npc_aela.direction: Aela: Stay on the columns to avoid dead ends.
messages.dialog.npc_brinn.hello: Brinn: I test routes by timing full laps.
messages.dialog.npc_brinn.rumor: Brinn: The archive lane has the most quest traffic.
messages.dialog.npc_brinn.direction: Brinn: Start at the plaza, then move southeast.
messages.dialog.npc_cass.hello: Cass: The old hall kept peace through records, not walls.
messages.dialog.npc_cass.rumor: Cass: Guild seals replaced old witness signatures.
messages.dialog.npc_cass.direction: Cass: Check both halls for context.
messages.dialog.npc_dane.hello: Dane: My job is to remember who sent you.
messages.dialog.npc_dane.rumor: Dane: If Elowen trusts you, most doors open.
messages.dialog.npc_dane.direction: Dane: Return north after finishing the south ring.
messages.dialog.npc_eris.rumor: Eris: The best scraps always reference another district.
messages.dialog.npc_eris.direction: Eris: Cross-town tasks are the real tutorial here.
messages.dialog.npc_fenn.hello: Fenn: Travelers often skip conversations and miss half the game.
messages.dialog.npc_fenn.rumor: Fenn: Keywords unlock better routes than speed does.
messages.dialog.npc_galen.hello: Galen: South ring knows the first ring's secrets.
messages.dialog.npc_galen.rumor: Galen: Ask Hale and Jory after you meet Elowen.
messages.dialog.npc_galen.direction: Galen: The chain ends where it began: Lyra.
messages.dialog.npc_hale.hello: Hale: I store old route mnemonics.
messages.dialog.npc_hale.rumor: Hale: Key, pass, ribbon, seal, then the town opens up.
messages.dialog.npc_hale.direction: Hale: Keep looping until names repeat.
messages.dialog.npc_iora.hello: Iora: Every errand in this town teaches one spatial shortcut.
messages.dialog.npc_iora.rumor: Iora: That is why errands stay short and local.
messages.dialog.npc_iora.direction: Iora: Use district roads, not grass wandering.
messages.dialog.npc_jory.hello: Jory: I compare stories from north and south districts.
messages.dialog.npc_jory.rumor: Jory: Most conflicts were solved by better record-keeping.
messages.dialog.npc_jory.direction: Jory: Quill confirms what everyone else implies.
messages.dialog.npc_kipp.hello: Kipp: You look like someone who enjoys complete checklists.
messages.dialog.npc_kipp.rumor: Kipp: If your inventory has badge, pass, ribbon, and seal, you're done.
messages.dialog.npc_kipp.direction: Kipp: One more lap, then rest.

itemDescriptions.item.herb_bundle.description: Lyra asked for this from the east quarter chest.
itemDescriptions.item.iron_key.description: A smith-marked key used as proof with Captain Sable.
itemDescriptions.item.market_pass.description: A stamped pass granting district access.
itemDescriptions.item.moon_badge.description: A reward from Lyra for returning the herb bundle.
itemDescriptions.item.sun_ribbon.description: Recovered from the archive chest for Quill.
itemDescriptions.item.guild_seal.description: Guild-issued seal proving completion of Quill's task.
